Constructor Detail

Horizontal

public Horizontal(double altitude,
                  double azimuth,
                  DateTime equinox)
Create Horizontal coordinates.

Parameters:
altitude - The altitude, in radians, positive above the horizon, negative below.
azimuth - The azimuth, in radians, measured westward from the South.
equinox - The equinox.
